channel.title: Error when adding to items.cfg
channel.description:
I added: [code]item = 10407 Lunar_Helm Its_A_Lunar_Helm 50000 50000 50000 50 50 50 50 50 50 50 50 50 50 50 50 item = 10408 Lunar_Torso Its_A_Lunar_Torso 150000 150000 150000 50 50 50 50 50 50 50 50 50 50 50 50 item = 10409 Lunar_Legs Its_A_Lunar_Legs 100000 100000 100000 50 50 50 50 50 50 50 50 50 50 50 50 item = 10410 Lunar_Gloves Its_A_Lunar_Gloves 75000 75000 75000 50 50 50 50 50 50 50 50 50 50 50 50 item = 10411 Lunar_Boots Its_A_Lunar_Boots 75000 75000 75000 50 50 50 50 50 50 50 50 50 50 50 50 item = 10412 Lunar_Cape Its_A_Lunar_Cape 75000 75000 75000 0 0 0 50 50 50 50 50 50 50 50 50 [/code] To items .cfg but now I get this:
Starting IceScape on 0.0.0.0:43594 Exception in thread "main" java.lang.ArrayIndexOutOfBoundsException: 16 at ItemHandler.loadItemList(ItemHandler.java:312) at ItemHandler.(ItemHandler.java:39) at server.main(server.java:29)
Itemhanlder line 312: [code] if (token3[(6 + i)] != null) {[/code] Itemhandler line 39: [code] loadItemList("item.cfg");[/code] Server line 29: [code] itemHandler = new ItemHandler();[/code] Does anyone know what I've done?

item.title: Error when adding to items.cfg
item.dc:creator: @Java_Is_My_Bitch Java Is My Bitch™
item.description:
@Java_Is_My_Bitch wrote:

[quote=“Frell, post:12, topic:152730”][quote author=Java Is My Bitch™ link=topic=208934.msg1832180#msg1832180 date=1192855357]
Isn’t there something you have to add before you can use those items.? Read upon that, by silabsoft i think. But i’m not sure… Never liked those items, their gay.
[/quote]
Hardcoding but causes java heap space.[/quote]

Wow, that sucks lol.

Read full topic

@krixus wrote:

NVM guys.

I got the old source and just added to that.

I’ll do the editing the new one now.

Thanks for helping guys.

I’ve learnt that spaces stuff it up (That must’ve been what it was)

@krixus wrote:

I’m adding the item Ids to the list so that they’re not: !! NON EXISTING ITEM !! ID: 10407 when you buy them from the shop.

I’m doing this so I can set their stats, etc.

item.title: Error when adding to items.cfg
item.dc:creator: @0wn3d_f0r_3v3r 0wn3d f0r 3v3r
item.description:
@0wn3d_f0r_3v3r wrote:

for one you put everything in the wrong place for two you probly need to add npcs for three here is a code of it example…

//-----ShopID---ShopName----------------------------------------Sell----Buy-----Item----Amount--Item----Amount--Item----Amount--Item----Amount--Item----Amount--Item----Amount--Item----Amount--Item----Amount--Item----Amount--Item----Amount--Item----Amount--Item----Amount--Item----Amount--Item----Amount--Item----Amount--Item----Amount--Item----Amount--Item----Amount

and

shop = 21 Betty's Magic Emporium. 2 2 554 5000 555 5000 556 5000 557 5000 558 5000 559 5000 562 500 560 200 221 300 579 1 1017 1 shop = 22 Lumbridge_General_Store 1 1 1931 5 1935 2 1735 2 1925 3 1923 2 1887 2 590 2 1755 2 2347 5 550 5 shop = 23 Bob's_Brilliant_Axes. 2 2 1265 5 1351 10 1349 5 1353 3 1363 5 1365 2 1369 1

thats example code just replace the number for example ‘1265’ with the item id you want

[size=20pt]does this help??[/size]
